metadata.Title: CVE-2023-1579 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Heap based buffer overflow in binutils-gdb/bfd/libbfd.c in bfd_getl64.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-1579` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-aarch64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-alpha-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-arc-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabi - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-arm-linux-gnueabihf - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-common - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-for-build - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-for-host - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-hppa-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-hppa64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-i686-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-i686-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-i686-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-ia64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-m68k-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-multiarch - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-powerpc-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-powerpc64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-powerpc64le-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-riscv64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-s390x-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-sh4-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-source - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-sparc64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-x86-64-kfreebsd-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnu - 2.40-2ubuntu3
binutils-x86-64-linux-gnux32 - 2.40-2ubuntu3
libbinutils - 2.40-2ubuntu3
libctf-nobfd0 - 2.40-2ubuntu3
libctf0 - 2.40-2ubuntu3
libgprofng0 - 2.40-2ubuntu3
No subscription required

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs. ccdm94> the vulnerable code was introduced by commit 31d6c13d (v2.39). The vulnerable function was introduced by commit f67741e1 (v2.39). Therefore, jammy and earlier are not affected.

criterions.comment: binutils package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.40-2ubuntu3').
